sentences.sContent: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.sCn: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

sentences.sContent: ...Their goal is to convince lawmakers to extend unemployment benefits...
...but it's still not easy being green How do we convince our inner caveman to be greener...
...He managed to convince Borlaug to help with his new effort and subsequently founded the Sasakawa Africa Association...

remMethod.val: con ＋ vinc(征服) ＋ e → 征服 → 说服， 使信服

words.tran: 令人信服的；有说服力的
令人信服地；有说服力地
使确信（convince的过去分词）；说服
使相信；使明白（convince的现在分词）

trans.tranOther: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists
